title: Why is creation more difficult than destruction? - Quora

response.answer_text: Hello. Creation is harder than to destroying anything. To create we need to follow the rules and must have a base to build from. While to destroy we will have to do the contrary. God bless you always! Rafael V. Nieto

Because Creation is a conscious act and Destruction is an eventuality. Because life is like a bubble. It takes effort and patience to learn to blow a bubble. But, eventually it will burst. That is the law of life/science. Non existence is all there is. Eventually everything will return to it.
